item.title: Taliban announce release of two Americans held in Afghanistan in a prisoner exchange
item.description: Afghanistan's Taliban government announced on Tuesday the release of two Americans in a prisoner exchange.

item.title: Ohio State defeats Notre Dame 34-23 in college football championship game
item.description: Ohio State dominated most of the night, and all through the playoffs
